column4: Hello, I have ubuntu 5.10 64-bit PC and I am using the live cd. When it installs it says mount cd to floppy and wont install becuase i dont have a floppy. Is there a way around this.
well its the only one i found around the house and i never ordered new one
Looks like 5.10 is so old it still uses floppies. Do yourself a favor and get 8.10 or 9.10...
